channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The End of the Essay? Humanities Departments Enter the AI Age
item.description: At a higher level, students must be convinced of the importance of thinking.

item.title: Latest Unsealed Docs Expose Obama, Hillary, And The Russia Lie
item.description: The declassified House Intelligence Committee report found the Kremlin had lots of dirt on Clinton it could have used, but didn't.

item.title: Timeline of TikTok sale murky after Trump gives it third extension from ban without any buyers
item.description: It's been nearly a month since President Trump announced he had buyers for the social media app TikTok, and since then, radio silence.

item.title: Skunked: Mayor Eric Adams wants restrictions on where New Yorkers smoke recreational pot
item.description: Mayor Eric Adams has diagnosed New York City with a chronic problem: too much recreational marijuana.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: ‘This Should NOT Be Included’ — Read Intel Officials’ Objections To ‘Extremely Sketchy’ Steele Dossier
item.description: Officials warned the Steele dossier suffered from 'POOR SOURCE TRADECRAFT' and compared it to the National Enquirer.

item.title: RNC Chairman Michael Whatley running for Senate in North Carolina
item.description: Republican National Committee Chair Michael Whatley plans to run for the Senate in North Carolina.

item.title: Supreme Court asked to overrule gay marriage decision
item.description: The Kentucky county clerk who refused to sign off on same-sex marriage licenses more than a decade ago has petitioned the Supreme Court to overturn it...

item.title: Hong Kong Authorities Are Hiding the Truth About Jimmy Lai
item.description: It will come as no surprise to those who are familiar with Xi Jinping’s rule that Lai is enduring inhumane treatment.

item.title: Russiagate, Revisited
item.description: Trump was the victim of an iniquitous dirty trick in 2016, but Gabbard has presented nothing new about Obama’s involvement.

item.title: Planned Parenthood Sues In Nevada To Keep Teens’ Abortions Secret From Their Parents
item.description: Studies show that abortion -- whether by scalpel or pill -- kills babies and leaves physical, mental, and emotional scars on women and girls.

item.title: The Wall Street Journal’s Epstein Reports Are Kind Of Proving Trump’s Point
item.description: I don’t know about you, but I’m certainly not going to be taken for another Russiagate ride, particularly now that this new would-be scandal comes wit...

item.title: Senate Confirms Matthew Lohmeier As Next Under Secretary Of The Air Force
item.description: In a 52-46 vote, the U.S. Senate confirmed former Space Force Lt. Col. Matthew Lohmeier as the next under secretary of the Air Force. The vote came al...

item.title: The Tides Turn for Trump’s Maritime Industrial Policy
item.description: Instead of promoting the maritime industry, government interventions cripple it.

item.title: Republicans Fumbled the Ball on Social Security
item.description: They had a chance to institute private accounts 20 years ago but allowed Democrats’ scare tactics to kill the idea. That failure cost us all dearly.

item.title: Trump was told his name surfaced in the Epstein files
